DOC.brief_summary: Phase I study evaluate excretion radioactivity , metabolic profile , pharmacokinetics , safety tolerability follow single oral administration [ 14C ] AZD2423 healthy male volunteer age 50 65 year ( inclusive ) .The purpose study investigate quickly AZD 2423 break product excrete analyse blood , faeces urine sample collect study .
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating Absorption , Distribution , Metabolism Excretion ( ADME ) Single Dose 14C AZD2423 Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Have body mass index ( BMI ) ≥18 ≤30 kg/m2 weight ≥50 kg ≤100 kg Regular daily bowel movement ( ie , production least 1 stool per day ) Provision sign date , write informed consent prior study specific procedure Healthy volunteer expose radiation level background ( eg , X ray examination ) > 5 mSv last year , > 10 mSv last 5 year cumulative total > 1 mSv per year life Participation prior radiolabelled study within 12 month screen visit ( Visit 1 ) History alcohol abuse excessive intake alcohol define regular intake 15 unit alcohol week . ( unit = 1 glass wine ( 125 mL ) = 1 measure spirit = ½ pint beer )
